sentences.sContent: Although some behavious don't hurt anyone, they hurt our society.
sentences.sContent_eng: Although some behavious don't hurt anyone, they hurt our society.
sentences.sCn: 尽管有些行为没有伤害他人，但是伤害了我们的社会。

sentences.sContent: This can be done by repeating groups of behavious and experiences.
sentences.sContent_eng: This can be done by repeating groups of behavious and experiences.
sentences.sCn: 这可以通过重复成组的行为和经历来实现。

sentences.sContent: Obviously, some fact and behavious which are wonderful and inequable can make us happy.
sentences.sContent_eng: Obviously, some fact and behavious which are wonderful and inequable can make us happy.
sentences.sCn: 显而易见，一些奇妙的、不同寻常的行为和事实叙述使我们快乐。
